txt.en: The Rohirrim have established Forthbrond as a forward encampment in the Gap of Rohan against the Dunlendings who are threatening to invade.
This village is one of many where the Dunlendings are ramping up for the invasion of Rohan.
Isendale has long been on the edge of border skirmishes between the Rohirrim and Dunlendings, and has many places to explore.
Many of Saruman's Wargs have inhabited this large warren, awaiting their master's commands.

Brôntrig overlooks the Gap of Rohan and provides the Dunlendings a choke point against any incursion from the Rohirrim. It is one of several villages where the Dunlendings are ramping up for the invasion of Rohan.
